籤詩版本二:
Njonda sayenera kusamala za anthu ang'ono, zinthu zikavuta amabweretsa mavuto.
Phokoso la limba liyenera kumveka ndi bwenzi lapamtima nthawi zonse limakhala labata komanso losamveka bwino.Ntchitoyi ndi ya aliyense.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi iyenera kukumana ndi chithunzi cha bwenzi lapamtima.
Kusunga zinthu mosadukiza kumabweretsa mwayi.
解曰:
Zhiyinfangxu. Osatengera zinthu zina. Dziyeseni ngati munthu wolemekezeka. Onse okondwa.
Zhiyin Fangxu ali ndi zilembo zinayi, zomwe poyamba zidalembedwa kuti Shiyin Fanghua.
籤詩故事一:
◇BoYa amachezera abwenzi (BoYa Broken Qin)
Boya, wotchedwa Yu, wotchedwa Rui ndi dzina laulemu Boya, anali mbadwa ya Yingdu, Chu State nthawi ya Spring ndi Autumn ndi Nyengo Yankhondo.
Zhong Ziqi ankagwira ntchito yodula nkhuni mu Ufumu wa Chu. Tsiku lina anakumana ndi Yu Boya akuimba zeze mumtsinje wa Han. Zhong Ziqi anamva mawu akuti: “Ndi lalitali ngati phiri komanso likugwedezeka ngati madzi oyenda.” Awiriwa anakwatirana ndipo analonjezana kuti adzakumananso pa nthawi ya Mid- Chikondwerero cha Autumn chaka chamawa.
Chaka chotsatira, Yu Boya adasunga nthawi yomwe adakonzekera, koma Zhong Ziqi anali atamwalira. Yu Boya atamva kuti Zhong Ziqi wamwalira, Yu Boya adaganiza kuti sipadzakhalanso nyimbo padziko lapansi ndipo sadzayimbanso zeze m'moyo wake.
nenani:
Kuphwanya Yao Qin ndi Feng Wei Han. Zi Qi samasamala yemwe amasewera.
Mphepo yamkuntho imadzetsa mabwenzi onse. N’zovuta kupeza bwenzi lenileni.
聖意: Chenjerani ndi kutuluka kwanu ndi munthu wankhanza wanu.Pofuna chuma, samalani zamalonda.Ndikoyenera kuchedwa kulowa m'banja.Sikoyenera kuti akazi oyenda pansi azisuntha minda, mbozi za silika ndi ziweto, kukasaka anthu mwachangu. , kusuma milandu ndi kusamuka, kukafunafuna zinthu zotayika mwamsanga, kutsekeredwa ndi matenda, ndi manda m’mapiri.
第X籤: Zambiri makumi asanu ndi anayi mphambu zinayi
